name: HoT Full Clear
description:
Get yourself a spot for your weekly <:heartofthorns:1181643246368194592> **Heart of Thorns** clear. We will be doing the following wings:
<:wing1:1181643231944003655> **Spirit Vale** (W1)
<:wing2:1181643228550811698> **Salvation Pass** (W2)
<:wing3:1181643224012558407> **Stronghold of the Faithful** (W3)
<:wing4:1181643219054887033> **Bastion of the Penitent** (W4)

We may also attempt some CMs if time and mood permits!

I expect all DPS players to come prepared with both a power and condi DPS build.

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- **Tank**
  - Tank on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**.
  - Tank on <:gorseval:703930783198347284> **Gorseval**.
  - Tank on <:keepconstruct:703930783223644200> **Keep Construct**.
  - Tank on <:xera:703930902069117008> **Xera**.
  - Tank on <:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** (Claim).
  - Tank on <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**.
- **Push**
  - Perform `Seeker Control` on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**.
  - Push the `Construct Core` on <:keepconstruct:703930783223644200> **Keep Construct**.
  - Push/CC `Rigom` at <:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog**.
- **Kiter**
  - Kite the `Flak` on <:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha**.

<:quick_generic:1176639827890937986> <:alac_generic:1176639824292220958> **Boon Roles:**
- **Sloth Fear**
  - Negate the <:fear:715162058802593872> **Fear** on <:slothasor:703930783206998087> **Slothasor**.
- **Immob**
  - Immobilise `Ghosts` on <:gorseval:703930783198347284> **Gorseval**.
  - Immobilise `Prides` on <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**.
  - Aid with `Seeker Control` and `Rigom` on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian** and <:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog** respectively.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- **Cannons**
  - Take cannon 1 (1-3) or cannon 2 (2-4) on <:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha**.
- **Handkiter**
  - Come with a hand-kiter build for <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> <:alac_dps:1176639831720337438> <:dps:1176639819191951390> **Non-Healer Roles:**
- **Condi @ VG**
  - Come with a condi DPS specifically for <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**'s `Red Guardian`.

<:contacts:1181934601040576512> **Roles Anyone Can Choose:**
- **Reflect**
  - Bring some kind of projectile reflect for <:matthias:703930783311593563> **Matthias**.
- **Towers**
  - Come with a <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** build to handle the `Towers` mechanic on <:escort:841311758147911742> **Escort**.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: A template for a <:heartofthorns:1181643246368194592> **Heart of Thorns** full clear. The description mentions doing CMs if time/mood permits.
